context_bundle.summary: Drug absorption, metabolism, and effect curves - Cmax, Tmax, AUC, first-pass metabolism, CYP3A4 enzyme saturation, threshold effects on receptor occupancy.

onboarding.quick_start: Key concepts: Cmax (peak concentration), Tmax (time to peak), AUC (total exposure), First-pass metabolism (liver processing before systemic circulation). CYP3A4 saturation = more drug reaches brain. DAT occupancy threshold ~60% for noticeable effects.
common_patterns: Faster dissolution = higher Cmax = sharper subjective effect
Same AUC different Cmax = same total exposure different experience
Enzyme saturation causes non-linear dose response
known_errors: 2x dose != 2x effect due to receptor saturation
Empty stomach speeds absorption but binder matrix rate-limits dissolution
